A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very poorly written. I felt that the story was a bit scattered\, and all the questions we had after TFA weren't answered (Snoke's Origins) or were disappointing (Rey's parents). Visuals and sound were typially very impressive with LucasArts studios\, and the acting was up to par. I did leave the theatre thinking it was alright\, but going over it again made me see past my Star Wars fanboyishness\, and made me realize all the negatives and the plot holes. Obviously see it for yourself\, but I cant agree with the Rotten Tomatoes ratings and review.
